SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.levels

Class LevelView

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.levels.LevelView
public class LevelView extends Object
The LevelView class manages the UI elements specific to a game level. It handles the display of hearts, win image, and game over image.

    • LevelView

      public LevelView(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay)
      Constructs a new LevelView instance with the specified root group and number of hearts to display.
      Parameters:
      root - the root group to which UI elements are added
      heartsToDisplay - the initial number of hearts to display
